thread.section_title: Europcar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Europcar | www.europcar.ie
thread.title: neil whittle

author: neil whittle
title: neil whittle
text: I was a little disappointed when I purchased Damage Refund Insurance at £26.84 online on your website when booking the vehicle to then be convinced by the man at the desk on collection that this cover wasn't good enough and if anything happened with the vehicle I would have a problem reclaiming the €1,300 deposit taken from my credit card. He then sold me full cover at €19.00 per day which I would have been happy with if I hadn't already purchased the other insurance online before hand. I think that this is quite misleading.
